DOC.brief_summary: The aim propose study evaluate knowledge low back pain gesture behavior among nurse low back pain use validated measure compare finding nurse without back pain .
DOC.brief_title: Gesture Behavior Knowledge Low Back Pain Among Nurses
DOC.detailed_description: A control , cross-sectional study carry 100 nurse ( 50 low back pain 50 without low back pain ) . The following assessment measure employ : Visual analogue scale ( VAS ) pain , Gesture Behavior Test ( GBT ) , Low Back Pain Knowledge Questionnaire ( LKQ ) , Roland Morris Questionnaire SF-36 .
DOC.criteria: Nonspecific chronic low back pain , Performance hospital sector ( hospital , emergency room and/or intensive care unit , Hourly load least 6 hour per day , Low back pain day last three month , Pain great 3 cm visual analog scale ( VAS ) . Dispute , Previous surgery spine , Pregnant .
